data.title: Brad Weinstein, Author at NBA.com: NBA Communications
data.text:
Kings coach Michael Malone fined

Sacramento Kings head coach Michael Malone has been fined $25,000 for verbal abuse of a game official and not proceeding directly to his locker room following the completion of the game, it was announced today by Rod Thorn, President, Basketball Oper

read more

Mavericks owner Mark Cuban fined

Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban has been fined $100,000 for confronting the game officials on the court after the conclusion of the game and directing inappropriate language to them, it was announced today by NBA Commissioner David Stern.

read more

Lakers’ Nick Young suspended; Suns’ Alex Len and Marcus Morris fined

Los Angeles Lakers guard Nick Young has been suspended one game without pay for throwing a punch at Phoenix Suns guard Goran Dragic with 7:33 remaining in the second quarter of the Lakers’ 121-114 loss to the Suns on Wednesday, Jan.
